pages.text: This is an addon for Botania and AES. Connect your AE2 networks to botania or store your mana in storage cells.$(br2)(No in-game book available)
Suck up that mana into your AE2 system!
Move your manna around your network like it's own fluid with this p2p tunnel
You gotta have somewhere to keep all that mana, why not in your AE2 system? 1k, 4k, 16k, 64k and 246k sizes available
Carry around your mana in your pocket. 1k, 4k, 16k, 64k and 246k sizes available

pages.title: Sparks
pages.text: $(bold)Wired Sparks$()$(br)A spark can also be placed on the input of a Mana P2P tunnel, allowing an insane amount of mana throughput with a dominant spark augment and multiple pools!$(br2)$(bold)Corporea Index$()$(br)A Corporea spark can be placed on a public system's ME interface, and then the Corporea Index will be able to extract items right out of your ME system!
